name: Nibelung
desc: The leader of the elemental dragons, who traveled beyond the world of Teyvat to gain the power of the Abyss to fight the Heavenly Principles.

customize.name: Elemental Dragons
customize.desc: An ancient race, who ruled Teyvat long before human existence. Dragons belong to the Light Realm.

customize.text: Nibelung was the Dragon King, the leader of the elemental dragons and the primeval dragon that had been born alongside that world.

customize.name: Primordial One
customize.desc: The First Descender, who defeated seven Dragon Sovereigns of the world and created people. The Primordial One may be Phanes.

customize.text:
After losing the first war with the Heavenly Principles, Nibelung acquired the
from outside of this world and led the dragons in a fight against the order established by the outsiders. An unimaginable war took place in Teyvat, causing destruction on an unprecedented scale. In war, the victor would inherit the right to shape the world, while the losers must turn into ash.
Voyager from a distant world
When the dragons ruled Teyvat, a voyager from a distant world was drawn to the light of Nibelung's world. She foresaw the death of this world and invited Nibelung to join her on a journey, but he refused to abandon his people. When the voyager returned to this world, Nibelung had already been defeated by the Primordial One and left the world to gain forbidden knowledge.

Even after the death of the Dragon King, the Dendro Dragon, Apep, did not give up on her attempts to change the course of history. She tried to gather new forbidden knowledge on the borders of a world that was hanging by a thread from destruction, but she was stopped by Celestia's divine nail.

customize.name: Irminsul
customize.desc: Irminsul can be thought of as a large tree growing downwards rather than upwards, containing all the knowledge and wisdom of the world from ancient times to the present. Ley Lines, like the roots of Irminsul, cross the earth, absorbing the memories of the world.

customize.text: Nibelung burned Irminsul in Natlan and destroyed its defenders, the

customize.name: Angels
customize.desc: Also known as Heavenly envoys, their primary duties were to help people. They were later expelled from Celestia and consequently lost their bodies and minds.

customize.text: . Because of this, the Natlanese Ley Lines were greatly damaged, and the surviving angel

customize.name: Yohualtecuhtin, Lord of the Night
customize.desc: An angel who created the Night Kingdom in Natlan.

imgDesc.text:
You witness with your own eyes the gargantuan wings from beyond the world, the once glorious and grand figure now pitiable, having completely sunk into the terrifying shadow.
The pitch-black flames scorch the land, and even the white tree nearly withered, and the final envoy's glow shattered and smashed, only able to subsist on the last leaves of the severed roots.
